name: Yeon APIs Archive
description: Simple and easy to use API.

params.text: Text for luminai to respond to

items.name: HydroMind
items.desc: See the list of supported AI models here: https://mind.hydrooo.web.id

params.text: Teks atau perintah untuk chat AI
params.model: 1See the list of supported AI models here: https://mind.hydrooo.web.id

items.name: Realistic AI Image
items.desc: Generate photorealistic AI image with style & resolution. (prompt: your prompt)(style: photorealistic, cinematic, hyperreal, portrait)(resolution: 512x512, 768x768, 1024x1024, 1920x1080) (seed: number)

params.imageurl: Image URL to be transformed into comic style

params.customkey: Optional custom key for short URL

items.name: Penghitaman Waifu
items.desc: Ubah gambar waifu menjadi versi 'Hitam', 'Coklat', 'Carbon', 'Piggy', 'Nerd', atau 'Botak'. Endpoint: /ai/penghitamanwaifu?url=&filter=

params.url: Image URL to apply waifu filter
params.filter: Filter type ( Hitam, Coklat, Nerd, Piggy, Carbon, Botak )
